synonyms: aṣṭame—in the Eighth Chapter; caitanya-lilā-varṇana-kāraṇa—the reason for describing Caitanya Mahāprabhu's pastimes; eka—one; kṛṣṇa-nāmera—of the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahā-mahimā-kathana—description of great glories.
translation: The Eighth Chapter gives the reason for describing Lord Caitanya's pastimes. It also describes the greatness of Lord Kṛṣṇa's holy name.
